results.title: Association of IL-10 and CRP with Pulse Wave Velocity in Patients with Abdominal Aortic Aneurysm
results.text_hl: Thus, the anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may also influence @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@arterial stiffness@@@.

results.title: Arterial stiffness in gestational diabetes: Latest insights.
results.journal: Best Pract Res Clin Obstet Gynaecol
results.text_hl: We also review the evidence that @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@AS@@@ could influence the need for different treatments for GDM, and the impact that the treatments, and in particular, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, could have on @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@arterial stiffness@@@.

results.title: Metformin: An Old Drug with New Tricks-Promising Role in Vascular Aging and Cardioprotection.
results.text_hl: In recent times, both clinical and preclinical studies revealed empirical data that confirmed the effectiveness of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the improvement of endothelial function and the decreasing of arterial @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@stiffness@@@ as a part of a reduction in the rates of cardiovascular events.

citations.NLM: Sivakumar R, Senghor KAA, Vinodhini VM, Kumar JS. Metformin: An Old Drug with New Tricks-Promising Role in Vascular Aging and Cardioprotection. Drugs Aging. 2025 Aug;42(8):709-731. PMID: 40471543

results.title: Insulin analogs as an add-on to metformin after failure to oral treatment in type 2 diabetic patients increase diastole duration. The INSUlin Regimens and VASCular Functions (INSUVASC) study.
results.text_hl: BACKGROUND: Fast acting @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ analogues are known to improve arterial @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@stiffness@@@. The combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ with @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ represents a widely used therapeutic strategy in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@.

results.title: Relation between augmentation index and adiponectin during one-year metformin treatment for nonalcoholic steatohepatosis: effects beyond glucose lowering?
results.text_hl: In multiple linear regression analysis, the independent predictors of @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@arterial stiffness@@@ improvement were @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment and increase in circulating @GENE_ADIPOQ @GENE_9370 @@@adiponectin@@@ levels.

results.title: Effect of rosiglitazone, metformin and medical nutrition treatment on arterial stiffness, serum MMP-9 and MCP-1 levels in drug naive type 2 diabetic patients.
results.text_hl: These results suggest that @CHEMICAL_Rosiglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077154 @@@rosiglitazone@@@ monotherapy has favorable effects on arterial @<m>DISEASE_Stiff_Skin_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566112 @@@stiffness@@@ compared with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ monotherapy independent of glycemic control.
